question: Is Virginia's Insurance Marketplace the same as FFM as far as no medical qualifications are needed for enrollment into a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace plan and pre-existing conditions will all be covered and cannot be held against you.
text:
Is Virginia's Insurance Marketplace the same as FFM as far as no medical qualifications are needed for enrollment into a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace plan and pre-existing conditions will all be covered and cannot be held against you.
          
        
Thats correct. All Qualified Health Plans offered through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace will have no exclusions for pre-existing conditions, nor will those with pre-existing conditions be charged more for their coverage, as stipulated in the Affordable Care Act (ACA).
